description: Send a collection of patches as emails. Patches can be specified as files, directions, or a revision list. More information: https://git-scm.com/docs/git-send-email.

useCases.description: Send the last commit in the current branch interactively:
Send multiple (e.g. 10) commits in the current branch:
Send an introductory email message for the patch series:
Review and edit the email message for each patch you're about to send:
